resources.string: This movie is finally out and i love the cinematics of this movie!

As the avengers and their allies have continued to protect the world from threats too large for any one hero to handle, a new danger has emerged from the cosmis shadows: Thanoes. A despot of intergalactic infamy, his goal is to collect all six infinity stones, artifacts of unimaginable power, and use them to inflict his twisted will on all reality.

The movie is super nice and there are stunning visuals which attracts people to watch and keep their eyes peeled throught the whole movie, the price you pay is worth it for the amount of effort that the production house put into and the effects that are displayed is awsome!
Ralph and Vanellope embark on an adventure inside the internet to find a spare part to fix a video game.
I cannot wait for this movie to be out, the first movie was really nice.

Scott Lang is grappling with the consequences of his choices as both a superhero and a father. Approached by Hope van Dyne and Dr. Hank Pym, Lang must once again don the Ant-Man suit and fight alongside the Wasp. The urgent mission soon leads to secret revelations from the past as the dynamic duo finds itself in an epic battle against a powerful new enemy.
This is the best marvel movie so far and i love it!
